products.title: Adorn Tank Poppy
products.body_html:
More than a tank. A wellness investment in how you look, feel, and recover.

Upper body fatigue can limit your performance and confidence. Adorn Tank was designed to deliver therapeutic benefits while maintaining sophisticated design elements.

Fit and Design
Signature scalloped trim at the décolleté adds elegance, while the flattering soft V-shaped neckline, combined with longer length design, provides optimal coverage and support. Medium support and longer length deliver versatility for various activities.

Visible Results
Feel confident and supported during every movement with enhanced circulation that promotes better blood flow and reduces muscle fatigue during extended wear and physical activity.

Passive Lymphatic Support
Engineered with our patented MicroPerle® technology strategically placed for enhanced circulation throughout wear, beads provide a gentle massage-like touch with every movement. This placement ensures continuous wellness benefits.

Targeted Compression Support
Engineered compression enhances circulation and reduces muscle strain across the upper body and core. provides improved circulation and posture support through subtle lift that enhances confidence without feeling restrictive. Intentional structure promotes better alignment and supports natural posture throughout periods of movement and stillness.

Clean Luxury Fabrics
Crafted from premium, ultra-fine knit Oeko-Tex certified materials that are hypoallergenic, skin safe, and tested to be free from harmful substances. Non toxic, breathable, and naturally protective with UPF 50+ for outdoor wear.

Slip it on and experience your daily dose of passive lymphatic massage therapy styled as your favorite performance top.

Everyday style. Continuous lymphatic support. Effortless results.

products.title: Rise Leggings - Vie en Rose
products.body_html:
Wear the color. Feel the cause.
Our limited edition Vie en Rose Lisse Leggings deliver clinical-grade support in a refined, versatile silhouette and beautiful pink hue created for Breast Cancer Awareness Month. With every purchase, 20% of proceeds support breast cancer research and care.

Fit and Design
The minimalist design philosophy delivers therapeutic benefits without compromising on effectiveness. Streamlined sophistication meets clinical-grade compression in a silhouette designed for extended comfortable wear across any occasion. Available in 25" and 27" inseams for a tailored fit based on your height and leg length.

Visible Results
Legs feel lighter and recover faster with improved circulation that alleviates tired, achy legs. The performance-tuned compression enhances overall comfort and well-being across any occasion.

Gentle Therapeutic Compression
A calibrated 13 to 8 mmHg gradient delivers therapeutic pressure that optimizes blood flow and muscle recovery. This targeted compression reduces swelling and discomfort, particularly beneficial for those who stand or sit for extended periods, while maintaining elegant simplicity.

Clean Luxury Fabrics
Crafted from premium, ultra-fine knit OEKO-TEX certified materials that are hypoallergenic, skin safe, and tested to be free from harmful substances. Non toxic, breathable, and naturally protective with UPF 50+ for outdoor wear.

Slip them on and experience your daily dose of therapeutic compression styled as your favorite legging.

Everyday style. Continuous compression support. Effortless results.

products.title: Iconic 3/4 Sleeve MicroPerle Top
products.body_html:
More than a top. A wellness investment in how you look, feel, and recover.

Tension collects in the shoulders and upper arms, creating puffiness and discomfort that limits your movement and confidence. The Iconic 3/4 Sleeve Top was designed to extend targeted support where you need it most.

Fit and Design
A signature neckline frames the décolleté beautifully while maintaining sophisticated aesthetic appeal. Versatile functionality transitions seamlessly from travel days to recovery rituals to evening layering, making this a true wardrobe essential.

Visible Results
Feel confident and supported with an enhanced posture that helps alleviate upper body strain and promotes better alignment during extended wear. The compression elevates skin texture and comfort while providing continuous wellness benefits.

Passive Lymphatic Support
Engineered with our patented MicroPerle® technology strategically placed above the elbows and in the back panel, beads provide a gentle massage-like touch to reduce puffiness and support fluid movement, especially in the shoulders and upper arms where tension tends to collect.

Targeted Compression Support
Engineered compression and lymphatic stimulation through the upper arms and back provide enhanced circulation and reduced tension in areas where stress commonly accumulates. A built-in molded bra construction eliminates layering needs while providing seamless lift and sculpting support.

Clean Luxury Fabrics
Crafted from premium, ultra-fine knit Oeko-Tex certified materials that are hypoallergenic, skin safe, and tested to be free from harmful substances. Non toxic, breathable, and naturally protective with UPF 50+ for outdoor wear.

Legs feel lighter and recover faster with improved circulation that alleviates tired, achy legs while enhancing overall comfort and well-being. Independent clinical studies demonstrate that wearing garments featuring MicroPerle® technology during 45 minutes of exercise three times weekly leads to visibly smoother skin and improved cellulite texture.

Engineered with our patented MicroPerle® technology strategically placed in the legs and abdomen, beads target critical zones of the lymphatic system with a gentle massage-like touch. products.title: Adorn Leggings
products.body_html:
More than a legging. A wellness investment in how you look, feel, and recover.

Long days, long commitments, and long stretches of sitting or standing can leave legs feeling heavy and fatigued. Adorn Leggings were designed to change that. They combine our signature wellness technology with a refined scallop trim, transforming an everyday essential into a stylish act of self-care.

Fit and Design
A double-lined high-waisted waistband sculpts, smooths, and enhances posture for a secure, confident fit. A laser-bonded pocket offers discreet storage, while the scallop hem elevates the leggings with fashion-forward elegance. Designed with 360° stretch for ultimate comfort, they move with your body while maintaining their shape and support. Available in 25" and 27" inseams for a tailored fit based on your height and leg length.

Visible Results
Legs feel lighter, look smoother, and recover faster whether you are at work, in motion, or traveling. Independent clinical studies show that Elastique leggings visibly improve skin texture and reduce the appearance of cellulite with consistent wear.

Passive Lymphatic Support
Engineered with our patented MicroPerle® technology, beads are strategically mapped along your body’s lymphatic pathways. With every movement, they provide a gentle massage-like touch that encourages drainage and restores a lasting sense of lightness.

Gentle Therapeutic Compression
A calibrated 13 to 8 mmHg gradient delivers therapeutic pressure from ankle to hip. This targeted support enhances circulation, reduces swelling, and aids recovery while maintaining ease of movement and avoiding the restrictive feel of traditional compression wear.

Clean Luxury Fabrics
Crafted from premium, ultra-fine knit Oeko-Tex certified materials that are hypoallergenic, skin safe, and tested to be free from harmful substances. Non toxic, breathable, and naturally protective with UPF 50+ for outdoor wear.

Slip them on and experience your daily dose of passive lymphatic massage therapy styled as your most fashion-forward legging.

Everyday style. Continuous lymphatic support. Effortless results.

products.title: The Fierce Bra
products.body_html:
More than a bra. A wellness investment in how you look, feel, and recover.

High-intensity workouts and long days demand complete security and support. The Fierce Bra delivers powerful performance with our signature MicroPerle® bead mapping hidden beneath a bold leopard print, proving strength and style can coexist beautifully.

Fit and Design
A high coverage silhouette ensures confidence and ease through every movement. The sculpting construction feels secure yet comfortable, while the leopard print elevates performance wear into a striking fashion statement.

Visible Results
Stay energized and strong throughout your most demanding pursuits. Customers often notice improved endurance, reduced upper body tension, and a lasting sense of stability and lightness during and after activity.

Passive Lymphatic Support
Engineered with our patented MicroPerle® technology, discreetly hidden beneath the signature leopard print pattern and mapped to follow your back’s natural lymphatic pathways. With every movement, the beads provide a gentle massage-like touch that encourages lymphatic flushing and promotes recovery.

Targeted Support and Stability
Engineered for high support, the compression construction reduces muscle fatigue, enhances posture, and maintains circulation so you feel secure and resilient through intense training sessions.

Clean Luxury Fabrics
Crafted from premium, ultra-fine knit Oeko-Tex certified materials that are hypoallergenic, skin safe, and tested to be free from harmful substances. Non toxic, breathable, and naturally protective with UPF 50+ for outdoor wear.

Slip it on and experience your daily dose of therapeutic compression styled as your favorite bra.

Everyday style. Continuous lymphatic support. Effortless results.

products.title: L'Original Stirrup Leggings
products.body_html:
More than a legging. A wellness investment in how you look, feel, and recover.

Long days, long travel, and long lists of responsibilities can leave legs feeling heavy, swollen, and fatigued. L’Original Stirrup Leggings were created to change that. They reimagine our signature technology in a sleek stirrup silhouette that transforms an everyday essential into a daily act of self-care.

Fit and Design
A high-waisted bonded waistband ensures a secure, flattering fit. The stirrup detail anchors the leggings under the foot, creating a sleek line while extending circulation support from the very start of the lymphatic pathway. Designed with 360° stretch for ultimate comfort, they move with your body while maintaining their shape and support. Available in 25" and 27" inseams for a tailored fit based on your height and leg length.

Independent clinical studies demonstrate that L’Original leggings improve circulation, reduce swelling, and visibly smooth skin texture with consistent wear.

Passive Lymphatic Support
Engineered with our patented MicroPerle® technology, beads are strategically mapped along your body’s lymphatic pathways. With every movement, they provide a gentle massage-like touch that encourages drainage and restores a lasting sense of lightness.

Gentle Therapeutic Compression
A calibrated 13 to 8 mmHg gradient delivers therapeutic pressure that begins at the foot and extends upward through the leg. By starting at the source, circulation is directed more effectively, helping to reduce swelling, ease fatigue, and support faster recovery. The stirrup design keeps compression anchored in place for consistent support throughout the day.

Clean Luxury Fabrics
Crafted from premium, ultra-fine knit Oeko-Tex certified materials that are hypoallergenic, skin safe, and tested to be free from harmful substances. Non toxic, breathable, and naturally protective with UPF 50+ for outdoor wear.

Slip them on and experience your daily dose of passive lymphatic massage therapy styled as your favorite stirrup legging.

Everyday style. Continuous lymphatic support. Effortless results.

products.title: Le Divine Bra
products.body_html:
More than a bra. A wellness investment in how you look, feel, and recover.

Long days, demanding workouts, and constant motion can leave the upper body feeling heavy and fatigued. Le Divine was designed to change that, providing medium support and our signature MicroPerle® bead mapping in a refined silhouette that marries therapeutic benefits with elegance and lasting comfort.

Fit and Design
The longer length cut enhances coverage, while the flattering décolleté neckline creates an elegant, feminine silhouette. Medium support construction provides reliable comfort for both active pursuits and everyday wear.

Visible Results
Experience a sense of lightness and poise that carries you through the day. Customers often note reduced puffiness in the back and chest, relief from shoulder and mid-back tension, improved posture, and a naturally sleek, supported shape in every setting.

Passive Lymphatic Support
Patented MicroPerle® beads are precisely mapped along your back’s natural lymphatic pathways. With every movement, the beads create a gentle massage-like touch that encourages drainage, eases puffiness, and restores balance.

Targeted Support and Stability
Engineered for medium support, the sculpting construction relieves strain across the shoulders and back while promoting alignment. Designed to move seamlessly with you, it transitions effortlessly from training to recovery to everyday wear.

Clean Luxury Fabrics
Crafted from premium, ultra-fine knit Oeko-Tex certified materials that are hypoallergenic, skin safe, and tested to be free from harmful substances. Non toxic, breathable, and naturally protective with UPF 50+ for outdoor wear.

Slip it on and experience your daily dose of passive lymphatic massage therapy styled as your most supportive bra.

Everyday style. Continuous lymphatic support. Effortless results.

products.title: L'Original Leggings
products.body_html:
More than a legging. A wellness investment in how you look, feel, and recover.

Long days, long flights, and long lists of responsibilities take a quiet toll. Swelling, fatigue, and sluggish circulation can leave even the strongest woman feeling heavy. L’Original Leggings were created to change that. They transform an everyday essential into a daily act of self-care.

Fit and Design
A high-waisted waistband sculpts, smooths, and ensures a secure, confident fit. Gradient compression provides circulation support from ankle to hip. Designed with 360° stretch for ultimate comfort, they move with your body while maintaining their shape and support. Available in 21”, 25", and 27" inseams for a tailored fit.

Independent clinical studies demonstrate that L'Original leggings improve circulation, reduce swelling, and visibly smooth skin texture with consistent wear.

Visible Results
Legs feel lighter, look smoother, and recover faster whether you are traveling, working, or moving through your routine.

Passive Lymphatic Support
Engineered with our patented MicroPerle® technology, beads are strategically mapped along your body’s lymphatic pathways. With every movement, they provide a gentle massage-like touch that encourages drainage and restores a lasting sense of lightness.

Gentle Therapeutic Compression
A calibrated 13 to 8mmHg of therapeutic pressure from ankle to hip comfortably directs circulation, reduces swelling, and aids recovery. This gradient compression maintains ease of movement while avoiding the restrictive feel of traditional compression wear. A comfortable waistband ensures a secure, flattering fit that stays in place all day.

Clean Luxury Fabrics
Crafted from premium, ultra-fine knit OEKO-TEX certified materials that are hypoallergenic, skin safe, and tested to be free from harmful substances. Non toxic, breathable, and naturally protective with UPF 50+ for outdoor wear.

Independent clinical studies demonstrate that wearing L'Original Leggings during 45 minutes of exercise three times a week leads to visibly smoother skin and reduced appearance of cellulite. Additionally, L’Original has been shown to improve circulation and reduce swelling.

Slip them on and experience your daily dose of passive lymphatic massage therapy styled as your favorite leggings.

Everyday style. Continuous lymphatic support. Effortless results.

products.title: L'Original Bra
products.body_html:
More than a bra. A wellness investment in how you look, feel, and recover.

Demanding workouts, long travel, and long days require maximum support without sacrificing comfort or circulation. The L'Original Bra was engineered to deliver both through advanced compression and MicroPerle® bead technology.

Fit and Design
High-support construction keeps everything securely in place, allowing you to focus on performance. Designed with a concealed compartment that allows for optional pad inserts, giving you the flexibility to customize your fit and coverage without compromising support.

Visible Results
Feel lighter, supported, and more energized. Customers often notice a reduction of puffiness in the back and relief from shoulder and mid-back tension with consistent wear. Improved lymphatic flow through the back panel helps eliminate metabolic waste whether training, traveling, or recovering.

Passive Lymphatic Support
Patented MicroPerle® beads are strategically mapped along your back’s natural lymphatic pathways, guiding flow toward the underarms where most breast lymph drains. With every movement, the MicroPerle® beads provide a gentle massage-like touch that encourages drainage, reduces puffiness, and restores a lasting sense of lightness.

Targeted Support and Stability
Engineered for high support, the bra’s sculpting construction keeps you secure through your most demanding activities. Wide bands distribute pressure comfortably, easing strain on the shoulders and back, while targeted zones enhance posture and stability without digging or pinching.

Clean Luxury Fabrics
Crafted from premium, ultra-fine knit Oeko-Tex certified materials that are hypoallergenic, skin safe, and tested to be free from harmful substances. Non toxic, breathable, and naturally protective with UPF 50+ for outdoor wear.

Slip it on and experience your daily dose of passive lymphatic massage therapy styled as your most supportive bra.

Everyday style. Continuous lymphatic support. Effortless results.
